ygData.subject: Guild question (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: I had an unusual thing happen last nite.  Our guild leader was trying to make my wizard an officer in the guild and could not.  Does anyone know why this might
ygData.messageBody:
I had an unusual thing happen last nite. Our guild leader was trying to
make my wizard an officer in the guild and could not. Does anyone know why
this might have occurred? I was in the same zone as him and already a
member. My bard is also an officer in the guild, but we have at least one
other member who has two officers in the guild on the same account. Has
anyone else encountered this problem? I tried zoning, camping, etc. all to
no avail. No matter what we tried he could not make me an officer. He was
able to make other people officers after trying on me however.

Kit
